channel.title: All the forest fires
channel.description:
Well, as some of you know I live in Florida now :P theres been lots of smoke from the forest fires down up in the panhandel and georgia, etc.
The sun looked amazing on tuesday :eek: everything turned orange, it was windy and dusty outside, lots of smoke.
I look in the sky.. you can see the moon and the sun quite close together! =0 The Moon was red with little spots, and the worst..
You know when you can look at the sun without a problem, there's something wrong. The sun was pure red and it kinda glowed, you could look at it without a problem :P
It had little black spots on it and it looked like they were moving :O
It was truly sexy.
Discuss.

I have a house around in Palm Coast and an apartment across the street from Hallandale Beach.

I feel so sexy.

item.title: All the forest fires
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

I live in palm harbor (central florida), and its very smokey. Its thick, and you can only see about 75 yards. Also congests you, makes you cough, dry throat. It sucks.

The sun looked amazing on tuesday :eek: everything turned orange, it was windy and dusty outside, lots of smoke.

The sun was pure red and it kinda glowed, you could look at it without a problem

It had little black spots on it and it looked like they were moving

Yea I live in Florida too. We couldn’t go outside beause the principal didn’t want kids with asthma(sp?) to start having asthma attacks (Just made that word up).
